General.Name: LBI Capital Bhd
General.Description: LBI Capital Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the development of residential and commercial properties in Malaysia. The company operates through two segments, Investment Holdings and Management, and Property Development. It is also involved in project management activities. The company was formerly known as Rumpun Hijau Capital Bhd and changed its name to LBI Capital Berhad in October 2004. LBI Capital Berhad was incorporated in 1978 and is based in Shah Alam, Malaysia. NG C.H. Holdings Sdn. Bhd.
